Terms of Service

Effective Date: 17th May 2025

Welcome to Approved Offers. These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of our website and services. By accessing or using Approved Offers, you agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy.

1. Description of Service

Approved Offers is a loan comparison platform that allows users to review, compare, and connect with third-party financial service providers and lenders. We do not issue loans or make credit decisions.

2. Eligibility

You must be at least 18 years old and reside in the United States to use our services. By using Approved Offers, you represent that you meet these requirements and that the information you provide is accurate and complete.

3. No Financial Advice

Approved Offers is not a lender, broker, or financial advisor. The information provided on our platform is for general informational purposes only and does not constitute legal, financial, or professional advice. You should consult with a qualified financial advisor before making any financial decisions.

4. Third-Party Services and Offers

Our platform displays offers from third-party lenders or financial institutions ("Providers"). We do not control or guarantee:

  • The accuracy of information provided by Providers
  • Approval for or terms of any financial products
  • The performance or availability of Provider services

Your interactions with Providers are governed by their terms and privacy policies. Approved Offers is not responsible for any transactions or disputes between you and any Provider.
